00023 #include <l4/re/rm>
00024 #include <l4/re/rm-sys.h>
00025 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00026 #include <l4/re/protocols>

00028 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_helper>
00029 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_stream>

00031 #include <l4/sys/task>
00032 #include <l4/sys/err.h>

00035 namespace L4Re
00036 {
00037 
00038 using L4::Opcode;
00039 
00040 long
00041 Rm::reserve_area(l4_addr_t *start, unsigned long size, unsigned flags,
00042                  unsigned char align) const throw()
00043 {
00044   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00045   io << Opcode(Rm_::Attach_area) << *start << size << flags << align;
00046   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00047   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00048     return err;
00049 
00050   io >> *start;
00051   return err;
00052 }
00053 
00054 long
00055 Rm::free_area(l4_addr_t addr) const throw()
00056 {
00057   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00058   io << Opcode(Rm_::Detach_area) << addr;
00059   return l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00060 }
00061 
00062 long
00063 Rm::attach(l4_addr_t *start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00064            L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs,
00065            unsigned char align) const throw()
00066 {
00067   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00068   io << Opcode(Rm_::Attach) << l4_addr_t(*start) << size << flags
00069      << offs << align;
00070 
00071   if (!(flags & Reserved))
00072     io << mem.cap() << mem;
00073 
00074   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00075   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00076     return err;
00077 
00078   io >> *reinterpret_cast<l4_addr_t*>(start);
00079 
00080   if (flags & Eager_map)
00081     {
00082       unsigned long fl = (flags & Read_only)
00083   ? Dataspace::Map_ro
00084   : Dataspace::Map_rw;
00085       err = mem->map_region(offs, fl, *start, *start + size);
00086     }
00087   return err;
00088 }
00089 
00090 int
00091 Rm::_detach(l4_addr_t addr, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00092             L4::Cap<L4::Task> task, unsigned flags) const throw()
00093 {
00094   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00095   io << Opcode(Rm_::Detach) << addr << size << flags;
00096   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00097   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00098     return err;
00099 
00100   l4_addr_t start;
00101   unsigned long rsize;
00102   io >> start >> rsize;
00103 
00104   if (mem)
00105     io >> *reinterpret_cast<l4_cap_idx_t*>(mem);
00106 
00107   if (!task.is_valid())
00108     return err;
00109 
00110   rsize = l4_round_page(rsize);
00111   unsigned order = L4_LOG2_PAGESIZE;
00112   unsigned long sz = (1UL << order);
00113   for (unsigned long p = start; rsize; p += sz, rsize -= sz)
00114     {
00115       while (sz > rsize)
00116   {
00117     --order;
00118     sz >>= 1;
00119   }
00120 
00121       for (;;)
00122   {
00123     unsigned long m = sz << 1;
00124     if (m > rsize)
00125       break;
00126 
00127     if (p & (m - 1))
00128       break;
00129 
00130     ++order;
00131     sz <<= 1;
00132   }
00133 
00134       task->unmap(l4_fpage(p, order, L4_FPAGE_RWX),
00135                   L4_FP_ALL_SPACES);
00136     }
00137 
00138   return err;
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 int
00143 Rm::find(l4_addr_t *addr, unsigned long *size, unsigned long *offset,
00144          unsigned *flags, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *m) throw()
00145 {
00146   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00147   io << Opcode(Rm_::Find) << *addr << *size;
00148   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00149   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00150     return err;
00151 
00152   l4_cap_idx_t c;
00153   io >> *addr >> *size >> *flags >> *offset >> c;
00154   *m = L4::Cap<Dataspace>(c);
00155 
00156   return err;
00157 }
00158 
00159 int
00160 Rm::get_regions(l4_addr_t start, Region **regions) throw()
00161 {
00162   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00163   io << Opcode(Rm_::Get_regions) << start;
00164   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00165   if (err > 0)
00166     *regions = reinterpret_cast<Region*>(&l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0]);
00167   return err;
00168 }
00169 
00170 int
00171 Rm::get_areas(l4_addr_t start, Area **areas) throw()
00172 {
00173   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00174   io << Opcode(Rm_::Get_areas) << start;
00175   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Rm));
00176   if (err > 0)
00177     *areas = reinterpret_cast<Area*>(&l4_utcb_mr()->mr[0]);
00178   return err;
00179 }
